channel.title: Help with Matrix?
channel.description:
Hi, I downloaded a server from this thread: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,548954.680.html
OK, so my problem is I don't know how to make myself donor, and I need to make it so I have 5 Jad kills to wear tokhaar-kal. And one more thing is: how do I make it so commands use "::" because right now some commands use";;" and use the console "`". Thanks, sorry im a bad coder lol

item.title: Help with Matrix?
item.dc:creator: @Skizard Skizard
item.description:
@Skizard wrote:

In mine there is and I downloaded the one from the download section labeled “Matrix”.
I haven’t tried those rights but if you add them in they should work.
Those rights are in Player.java if you search ExtremeDonator or Donator in there.
Try experimenting with it as I said I haven’t changed or bothered with player rights. I just am testing my skills with editing the cache to keep it updated with runescapes.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Matrix?
item.dc:creator: @AssassinsCRB AssassinsCRB
item.description:
@AssassinsCRB wrote:

^there isnt that stuff on the source i downloaded please help i really need donor and tzhaar kal

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Matrix?
item.dc:creator: @Skizard Skizard
item.description:
@Skizard wrote:

Try changing this:
if (username.equalsIgnoreCase(“izaazk”))
{
rights = 11;
}
That would be the extremedonator player right and for donator do
if (username.equalsIgnoreCase(“izaazk”))
{
rights = 8;
}

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Matrix?
item.dc:creator: @AssassinsCRB AssassinsCRB
item.description:
@AssassinsCRB wrote:

how do i make a title for myself?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Matrix?
item.dc:creator: @Skizard Skizard
item.description:
@Skizard wrote:

For your first problem just make yourself donor in player.java where all the other player rights are.
And if you are having troubles killing Jad then just delete that bit of code saying
“You must kill Jad” or whatever and then you won’t need to kill him to wear it.
If you don’t want other people wearing it then just put it under donator items or something.
Or just do what I do and play RS and no life Jad to get better.
If you are Admin I believe you have to use the command console but if you aren’t then you are able to use ::.
Sorry I don’t play on the server. I just test out new cache’s that RS updates to.

Read full topic
